General.Name: Zhewen Interactive Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhewen Interactive Group Co., Ltd. provides intelligent marketing solutions in China. It offers digital marketing, brand management and communication, public relation communication, community marketing, event marketing, live broadcast and short video platform, and other integrated digital marketing system services. The company serves automobile, FMCG, financial, internet IT, e-commerce, and leisure and entertainment industries. Zhewen Interactive Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Ms. Qiao Lan  Wang
